reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Developing National Capability for Security and Stabilization

description.narrative: The purpose of this programme is to develop the long-term capability of the Lebanese security system LSS to control risk and guarantee the respect of the rule of law, thus ensuring sustainable stabilization processes for the country

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations (NEAR)

title.narrative: Level of public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

description.narrative: Level of public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

title.narrative: Level of public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Limited public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

comment.narrative: Limited public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

target.value: Increase public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

comment.narrative: Increase public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform

actual.value: Public knowledge, awareness and analytical capacity available on Security Sector Reform increased
